Description:
Indicates user activity that is unusual for the user or consistent with known attack patterns.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Azure AD Threat Intelligence
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'investigationsThreatIntelligence'
